feed.title: Category: trip report contest | Hiking in Finland

entry.title: Trip Report Contest: Vote!
entry.content:
The voting for the 2nd Trip Report Contest is open - who will win the Gossamer Gear Kumo backpack?

Probably everyone was outdoors backpacking and climbing or was intimidated by the haiku challenge - as there were just two entries! Read them both - they’re great, inspiring reads - and then leave a comment with your favourite one.

Luke’s A Snowy “Epic” in Grayson Highlands a.k.a Two Idiot Brothers on a Trip.

Peter’s Spring overnighter with the kids.

Voting is open till Sunday, 9th of June, Noon Finnish time. On Sunday afternoon I will tally up the comments* and announce the winner in the next TWIR. Happy reading and good luck!

* I will check IP address on odd looking comments and they might disqualified. It’s best to use your nickname/ real name when commenting.
